å‚è€ƒèŒƒæ–‡ï¼š
When it comes to ( the choice of read ), different people hold different views. Some contend that ( prefer to read E-books ). For one thing, ( It is very easy to read, you can download in the internet want to read the content to your phone, anywhere you can read. ). For another ( A lot of E-books do not spend money to buy, so that E-books can help you save money. )
In spite of all these claims, others maintain that ( paper books is better ), and they point out that ( paper books give a feeling of true reading). Another instance often cited is that ( read paper books can protect peopleâ€™s eyes ).
Itâ€™s no easy task to find a satisfactory answer to the issue. As for me, thereâ€™s some truth to both arguments. Itâ€™s advisable to ( make your choice depending on according to your context ).

Recently,more and more people are talking about where to see a movieé¢˜ç›®æ”¹å†™.From my perspective,it is totally undoubted thatwatching movies at home is better than in a cinemaä¸»è®ºç‚¹.The reasons why Ibelieve so are listed as below.
The first point that I want to mention is thatwatching movies at home saves moneyçº·ä¹±ç‚¹1,and that is becausewe don't need to buy the expensive movie ticket or food at the cinemaåŸå› .What is more,itâ€™s easer for us to understand that it's more comfortable for us to watch movies at homeåˆ†è®ºç‚¹2,which is because we can simply lie down in our bed or couchåŸå› .
From what I mention above,we can easily come to the conclusion thatwatching movies at home is better than in a cinemaä¸»è®ºç‚¹å†æ¥ä¸€é.After all,watching movies at home saves money and it's more comfortableåˆ†è®ºç‚¹æ”¹å†™ä¸€è¾¹.

ä¿¡ä»¶

Dear Mikeå¯¹æ–¹åå­—,
This is Li Ke from Beijingä½ å®¶ä¹¡/å­¦æ ¡. The reason that I am writing to you is because.we will have an English corner on this Saturday at our schoolç¬¬ä¸€æ¡å†…å®¹.Besides of thar,here goes another thing that I think is important,which is that the topic will be about environmentç¬¬äºŒæ¡å†…å®¹.Lastly,I believe you should know this at the very end of my letter,and that is we really want you to be there to join usç¬¬ä¸‰æ¡å†…å®¹.Ireally appreciate your time for reading my letter and Iâ€™m looking forward to your reply.I hope everything goes well with your life.
Li Keç½²å

å›¾è¡¨

As it can be seen from this chart,up to 60 percent of working people rarely do physical exercises.And this shows that most workking people need more physical exercises to keep healthy.Also,this chart tells us that 25 percent of working people do physical exercises once a month,which means that although some people try to exercise,the number is still small,and so is the amount of exercise.The rest of the chart indicates that only 15 percent of working people do regular physical exercises,pointing out that there are but a few people really caring for their health and doing exercises regularly.The overall situation that the chart shows is probably because people today are usually busy working so they don't have time for physical exercises.If the data is true,no matter how much free time they have,they should cultivate a habit of doing regular exercise,since it keeps our body healthy.
